The Army Management screen is where we build our army. As the
game progresses, we'll collect a roster of regular and veteran

units. Right now, we've limited unit types available, but a few victories
will quickly improve our options .

Units have costs assigned to them and, initially, we have a limited budget
to spend. Let's use this now to create our starting army.

We simply drag a unit from our roster to add it to our army. Once
